text: "Moving in Stereo" is a 1978 song by American rock new wave band The Cars and is the eighth song from their debut album The Cars. Like You're All I've Got Tonight, Bye Bye Love and All Mixed Up, three other songs from the album, it continues to get regular airplay on classic rock stations and despite not being released as singles. In Popular Culture The song plays during a fantasy sequence in the 1982 movie Fast Times at Ridgemont High. The song plays as Brad, played by Judge Reinhold, imagines Linda, played by Phoebe Cates, climbing out of the pool in slow motion. Category:1978 songs Category:The Cars songs
title: Moving in Stereo
